title: One Piece Episode #523 Anime Review
author: The Fandom Post
description: A review of Episode 523 highlighting the crew's underwater journey and the revelation about Kuma's protection of the Thousand Sunny. The review praises the episode for establishing setup elements and making Kuma an even more interesting character.

title: Anime Reviews: One Piece Episode 523 - A Surprising Fact! The Man Who Guarded The Sunny!
author: Burning Lizard Studios
description: Review calling Episode 523 'one of the more satisfying One Piece episodes in a while, with some really good art' despite some animation quality issues.

title: One Piece - Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 523-538) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A retrospective review of the Fish-Man Island Arc's opening episodes. Notes that the arc 'gets off to such a painfully slow and frankly often unfunny start that it's become a frequent I checked out at this point moment for many fans over the years.'

title: One Piece 523 Discussion
author: AnimeBase Community
description: Community discussion thread for Episode 523. Fans commented on the flashback of Gol D. Roger being 'pretty cool' and praised Franky explaining the Kuma situation, calling it a 'pretty good episode.'

title: 523-525: A Surprising Fact! the Man Who Guarded the Sunny!
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: A blog post covering episodes 523-525 from someone watching One Piece for the first time. Discusses the revelation about Kuma's protection and the crew's underwater journey.

title: Episode 523 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 523 containing plot summary, character appearances, production credits, trivia, and manga differences.

title: A guide to One Piece's Bartholomew Kuma
author: InBetweenDrafts
description: An episode guide covering all of Bartholomew Kuma's appearances and key moments, including his protection of the Thousand Sunny revealed in Episode 523.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains major spoilers for Kuma's entire storyline
